nycTheatreExcerpt: Carrie Coon is unleashed from her corsetsand every other stitch of clothingin the blistering Broadway revival of her husband Tracy Letts's macabre thriller "Bug," being presented by Manhattan Theatre Club roughly 20 years after it was first seen in New York off-Broadway. (Due to the prevalence of nudity, audiences must turn off their phones and have them put in secure pouches for the show's duration.)
